meanings.sent1: The brinies ocean air filled our lungs with its salty scent.
meanings.sent2: The chef added brinies sea salt to enhance the flavor of the dish.
meanings.sent3: The brinies waves splashed playfully against the shore.
meanings.sent4: Her tears were as brinies as the sea itself.
meanings.sent5: The brinies breeze carried the taste of the ocean to our picnic.

meanings.definition: The salty taste of salt water
meanings.sent1: After swimming, I could still taste the brinies on my lips.
meanings.sent2: The sailors enjoyed the brinies of the sea during their voyage.
meanings.sent3: She wrinkled her nose at the brinies of the ocean water.
meanings.sent4: The brinies of the sea lingered on his tongue long after he left the beach.
meanings.sent5: The brinies of the ocean made her thirst for a cold drink.

meanings.definition: A person who is experienced or knowledgeable in a particular field
meanings.sent1: He was considered a brinies in the world of finance due to his expertise.
meanings.sent2: The old sailor was a brinies when it came to navigating the seas.
meanings.sent3: The young chef learned a lot from the brinies in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: She sought advice from the brinies of the art world before starting her project.
meanings.sent5: The brinies of the forest guided us safely through the wilderness.
